website_summaries.verdict: Moderately priced vacuum pump. You can find better models.
pros: The vacuum pump has a so-so price
cons: It isn't as well-engineered or strong as other pumps

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in July last year, and used it as a backup, so it didn't get more than a handful of uses. This Spring, it failed on the first job. I sent it back, it's been rebuilt and returned to me, so the warranty was honored, but I had to pay shipping to send it back and to receive it. We'll see if it lasts any longer this time.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging, but good product so far.
customer_reviews.text: The box I received was very beat up with some tape on it, to the point where I worried this was a prior return. It works great though and all documentation/parts were included as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase, Really well built vacuum pump. I am glad I went with the American Built unit, its built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: BCoop

customer_reviews.title: Very good pump
customer_reviews.text: A little noisier then I thought. But seems so far as a very solid pump. Very heavy duty. Pumps well.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hall

customer_reviews.title: THESE PUMPS WERE HIGHLY RATED BY SOME THIRD PARTY WEBSITE ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE PUMPS WERE HIGHLY RATED BY SOME THIRD PARTY WEBSITE SO WE TRIED THEM OUT, ALL OF THEM HAVE FAILED IN LESS THAN THREE MONTHS OF DAILY USE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good performance. A vacuum shutdown valve is the only thing for perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, this vacuum pump has a good pricing/performance relation. It is a little bit cheaper than the YJ newer one, and does the job quick for residential issues. I recommend use the four port manifold this pump; if not, you will need an special valve to shut the vacuum line in order to prevent vacuum loses when trying to connect the refrigerant can.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good pump
customer_reviews.text: Unit is load and failed in less than 2 years. customer service is non existant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality vacuum pump....
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum pump for HVAC work. I know that Yellow Jacket tends to cost more that other brands but I always feel like I am getting well designed and engineered tools for my money that I hope to use for many years. I do property management so I am not 100% HVAC but I feel like this is a good quality product that will quickly evacuate the residential split systems that I always work on and will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RobV

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After multiple times of changing oil it still does not pull down pass 480 microns!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: This is the most awesome vac pump I have ever seen or used
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome vac pump I have ever seen or used. Works better than any other. Solid, heavy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: this didnt work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: i bought this before season and by the time i used it i found out it didnt work hoping to get a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for on this one, ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for on this one, you pay for a quality pump youll get a quality pump.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: anerican made quality
customer_reviews.text: It works flawlessly and its been over 2 months by now
customer_reviews.author: Lance D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Suction is fast, constant and great. Pumps down to -30 vacuum very fast. It has got to be the quietest pump I have ever had and I recommend it to everyone. Buy great quality once and don't buy several cheaper pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Kimothy Steele

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a year I can report its the best pump Ive ever used
customer_reviews.text: Now that Ive had this pump for over a year I can report its the best pump Ive ever used. Will pump a 2 ton system below 500 microns in less than 10 minutes. Seriously Im afraid some times it may suck all the oil out the compressor!!! Love this pump, well worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: aaserv

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a good quality vacuum pump, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues, and cuts major time off of jobs being 7cfm
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best vacuum pump I have purchased and a big plus that it is made in USA. Worth the extra money over the "economy" models that are not rebuildable and made in China. I use this for my portable milking machine and it is used daily, not excessively loud, doesn't smoke like others have and pulls great vacuum quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: excellent pump
customer_reviews.text: For the money I think this pump is the best. It is built extremely well which u will find out when u pick it up. Also it is very fast at pulling vacuums. I've seen some reviews about a lot of "smoke" coming from the exhaust and well it's an exhaust so your gonna have that but if it is a problem u can screw off the exhaust screen and screw a hose onto it.
customer_reviews.author: thomas youmans

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I will only buy yellow jacket products from now on. This item is very high quality and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I waited to write this review
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I waited to write this review. I absolutely love my YJ Pump, although I was kinda iffy at first but now that I have outfitted it with two 3/8" Hoses, and sealed off the 1/4" port, this works like a charm. I have also found out that if the power goes off momentarily, it will not suck back into the system. Worth every Penny!
customer_reviews.author: vilaire henry

customer_reviews.title: Blows oil
customer_reviews.text: I waited to long to return this or I would have. It doesn't appear to be pulling a good suction but the other problem is blowing oil. When you first turn the unit on it blows oil out the exhaust port at least three feet into the air. I sprayed myself and anything else close to it twice before using a short garden hose on the port. The instructions say to not face the port but I could not get far enough away from the unit and still be able to turn it on without getting hit. Other reviewers and noted this problem also.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Proctor

customer_reviews.title: I used this for the first time and it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and it stopped pumping half way through, checked the oil again and it was at the proper level. Waited a couple of hours, and It started to work again for 15 seconds then it started releasing pressure and never worked again. Total junk! It's still under warranty but I don't want to waist anymore money on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this vacuum pump can't be overstated. This thing rocks. I wish you could get a deal from Yellow Jacket for a micron gauge when you buy this pump.
customer_reviews.author: sims4160

customer_reviews.title: made in the usa
customer_reviews.text: fast service a nice pump should last along time yellow jacket makes the best vacuum pumps and love the usa flag logo on my tools thanks
customer_reviews.author: scooter 3  russle

customer_reviews.title: My husband thinks Yellow Jacket is one of the better vacuum pumps
customer_reviews.text: My husband thinks Yellow Jacket is one of the better vacuum pumps. I wanted to get him what he likes and he hasn't complained to date.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Turner

customer_reviews.title: Lack of adapter for R-134A makes me give it 4 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Nixe vaccum pump,very disappointed that it did not have an adapter for R-134A ...especially for the $!!!!!....
customer_reviews.author: Hubcap

customer_reviews.title: The pump is fine, I was kindve irritated when the bottle of ...
customer_reviews.text: The pump is fine, I was kindve irritated when the bottle of Pump oil that comes with it showed up half full. Unfortunately, I didnt have the time to review earlier as I had a job that had to be done and i needed what i had.
customer_reviews.author: Justin James

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: A BEAST! This thing gets water to boil at room temperature! Make Peeps PAY for their sweetness! MUAAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAAAAAAA!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: Dose not pull as good as my older pump
customer_reviews.text: it is ok. Dose not pull as good as my older pump. kind of odd
customer_reviews.author: David Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Performance Issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump 3 years ago and only used it 8 time for light work. Now, it won't pull a vacuum past 400 microns, even after changing the oil twice. My Harbor 3 CFM dual stage pulls down to 25 microns consistenly and it was less that half the price as the YJ. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: @conrad carter
customer_reviews.text: I have been laughing at your review so hard I cried!!! 😂😂😂 It happened to me one time when pump turned over. I knew immediately why you were getting oil shower. Nevertheless thank you for laugh
customer_reviews.author: JFS12

product_meta.title: Yellow Jacket 93600 Vaccum Pump,
product_meta.description: 7 CFM economy vacuum pump, 115 Volt, 60 Hz single phase, 28 oz. oil capacity, Internal intake check valve prevents oil backup into the system during a power failure, Intake filter screen keeps damaging particles from entering the pump, All metal construction with steel handle - Manufacturer: Yellow Jacket.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
